library.description: Location to library QC and pooling
library.help_text:
Currently, the pipeline can only process input library information files in a fixed format. Please refer to this resource when uploading the input library information files. See [usage docs] (https://altoslabs.benchling.com/altoslabs/templates/tmpl_phYDaocW). 

 Index plate name:
 1. Illumina: IDT for Illumina UD Indexes Plate A-D 
 2. 10X: 10X Dual Index Kit NN Set A, 10X Dual Index Kit NT Set A, 10X Dual Index Kit TT Set A, 10X Single Index Kit N Set A, 10X Single Index Kit T Set A. 
 3. NEB: NEBNext Multiplex Oligos for Illumina (96 UDI) set1

indexs.help_text: Currently, the pipeline is only capable of handling index plates that are included in the list available at the following link. Please consult this resource when selecting the appropriate index for your needs. See [usage docs] (https://github.com/wzheng0520/demux_samplesheet_tower/tree/updating/index)

seq.help_text: When working with Novaseq data, the current pipeline can only handle one lane at a time. If you need to separate the data into different lanes or add lane information to the sample sheet, please edit it after the run is completed.

override.help_text: The format of the override cycle is Y;I;I;Y. For example, Y150;I8;I8;Y150.
